text: Mireille Granelli is a retired French film actress.Hughes p.13 ==Selected filmography== * Beatrice Cenci (1956) * Noi siamo le colonne (1956) * Les Truands (1956) * Mimi Pinson (1958) * Hercules, Prisoner of Evil (1964) * Mission to Caracas (1965) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Hughes, Howard.
